ISSUE.TITLE: Table visualization with column named "children" renders +/- buttons
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: <!-- We use GitHub only for bug reports Anything else should be posted to https://discuss.redash.io For support, help & questions use https://discuss.redash.io/c/support For feature requests & ideas use https://discuss.redash.io/c/feature-requests **Found a security vulnerability?** Please email security@redash.io to report any security vulnerabilities. We will acknowledge receipt of your vulnerability and strive to send you regular updates about our progress. If you're curious about the status of your disclosure please feel free to email us again. If you want to encrypt your disclosure email, you can use this PGP key. --> ### Issue Summary Initially reported in [this forum post](https://discuss.redash.io/t/is-it-possible-to-hide-common-rows-under-a-spoiler/5060). This is related to [this](https://ant.design/components/table/#components-table-demo-expand-children) Antd feature. Basically having a "children" column name in a query is triggering the +/- button to appear. Can be an issue from Antd side, but creating the issue here so we have it mapped. ![children-column](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3356951/69486688-22e56e80-0e2d-11ea-9f71-38e2cdbea340.gif) ### Steps to Reproduce 1. Create a query with a column named `children` or use [this](https://redash-preview.netlify.com/queries/260) 2. Check it has an extra +/- button ### Technical details: * Redash Version: v8 * Browser/OS: Any * How did you install Redash: --

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Table visualization: accept timestamp for date/time columns (#4389)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: getredash/redash#4393 Table visualization with column named "children" renders +/- buttons
